title: Dev.D
writer: Sharat Chandra Chaterjee, Abhay Deol, Vikramaditya Motwane
short_cast: Abhay Deol, Mahie Gill, Kalki Koechlin, Dibyendu Bhattacharya, Parakh Madan, Kuldeep Singh, Gurkirtan, Aseem Sharma
cast: Abhay Deol, Mahie Gill, Kalki Koechlin, Dibyendu Bhattacharya, Parakh Madan, Kuldeep Singh, Gurkirtan, Aseem Sharma
genre: Hindi-Language Movies, Movies Based on Books, Bollywood Movies, Dramas, Romantic Movies
desc: Because they come from different castes, the son of a tax collector and his true love are not allowed to marry, sending them down divergent paths.
